name: Survival: Fountain of Youth
description:
You are a member of the expedition of Juan Ponce de Leon in search of the Fountain of Youth, a widely known historical event of the Age of Discovery. Having survived a shipwreck, you have to learn to live on an uninhabited island: hunt, gather and manage resources, build shelters, discover new technologies, develop skills, resist diseases and weather conditions, and fight predators. Your goals are figuring out the fate of the extinct Indian civilization and your shipwrecked crew, exploring the archipelago, gradually building an exceptional ship, as well as finding the Fountain of Youth.

Sea travels


To move between the islands, you will be able to build various sea vessels and test your survival skills not only on land but also in the open sea. When aiming to cover a long distance, you’ll need to carefully prepare for your travels, store food, water and medicine, repair and upgrade your ships.

Technologies of the 16th century


There will be hundreds of items that are necessary for survival, from the simplest tools made of sticks and stones to advanced technologies of the era: muskets, cannons, navigational tools and sailing ships.

Islands and treasures


Each island is different with its landscape, climate, flora, fauna and resources. You may chart efficient routes and build your bases on the ruins of an ancient civilization with lots of hidden mysteries and treasures.

There is a story behind it


You will dive into the vortex of exciting events but it is for you to decide how much you want to know about the events on the archipelago. The storyline is always there to follow and you will be able to learn a lot from the remnants and artifacts of disappeared tribes. Which path will you take to reach the main goal of the expedition? The choice is yours.

Hardcore survival


Plan every step, as even the smallest mistake can come at a cost. Dangerous animals, weather, plants, diseases, hunger, thirst, shipwrecks — everything will test your strength and will to survive. Are you ready to take the challenge?

Additional features:


  • 30+ handcrafted game locations
  • 300+ types of items to produce
  • 24 survival skills and abilities with upgrades
  • Variety of ways to complete the game
  • 5 types of sea vessels with 16 modifications
